name: Animal Rescue Truck: Offraod Farm Transportation
name_original: Animal Rescue Truck: Offraod Farm Transportation
description:
Start your off-road trucks and get ready to transport and rescue the farm animals in heavy snow and extreme weather conditions in Animal Rescue Offroad Truck: 4x4 Simulation. These transporting task are not easy especially with snowy and slippery off-road mountainous & hilly tracks.
In this transporter simulation game Animal Rescue Offroad Truck: 4x4 Simulation you need to load and transport different farm animals, cows, horses, sheep and many more, from one location to another but this time with unfriendly weather and road conditions. You must take care during the drive and ensure that all the loaded animals have safe journey without any injuries and reach their destination safe and sound. You will also called to rescue and transport the injured animals on the farm or during the transport.
So download the addictive truck transporting game called Animal Rescue Offroad Truck: 4x4 Simulation and enjoy the rocky mountain truck drive with beautiful farm and hill environments and natural beauty. Get ready to rescue, save and transport animal lives with your unique truck driving skills!
Game Features:
1) Addictive and Entertaining Gameplay
2) Superb 3D graphics and environments
3) Easy and action pack rescue missions
4) Smooth and Cool Controls
